languages.text: "Не думаю. Пришлось попотеть, чтобы незаметно ослабить крепления клетки. К тому же без вас с Глейто результат был бы слишком непредсказуем, а я не мог позволить себе ошибку. Но в одном я был уверен — наши с Глейто импланты обменивались логами данных, а значит вы были живы. И я ждал".

traits.locale_text: "Не думаю. Пришлось попотеть, чтобы незаметно ослабить крепления клетки. К тому же без вас с Глейто результат был бы слишком непредсказуем, а я не мог позволить себе ошибку. Но в одном я был уверен — наши с Глейто импланты обменивались логами данных, а значит вы были живы. И я ждал".
traits.speaker: SolomorneCompanion

languages.text: "I doubt it. Loosening the cage's fastenings without being noticed proved to be quite difficult. Besides, without you and Glaito there, the outcome would have been too unpredictable, and I had no room for error. But there was one thing I knew for sure: Glaito's implants and mine were exchanging data logs, which meant you were alive. So I waited."
languages.original_text: "Не думаю. Пришлось попотеть, чтобы незаметно ослабить крепления клетки. К тому же без вас с Глейто результат был бы слишком непредсказуем, а я не мог позволить себе ошибку. Но в одном я был уверен — наши с Глейто импланты обменивались логами данных, а значит вы были живы. И я ждал".

traits.locale_text: "I doubt it. Secretly loosening the cage's fastenings took quite a bit of strain. Besides, without you and Glaito, the outcome would have been too unpredictable, and I had no room for error. But there was one thing I knew for sure: mine and Glaito's implants were exchanging data logs, which meant you were alive. So I waited."

But there was one thing I knew for sure: mine and Glaito's implants were exchanging data logs, which meant you were alive. So I waited."

languages.text: “这恐怕不太现实，想在不引起注意的情况下拆开笼子的紧固件，恐怕相当困难。而且，你和格雷托也不在场，强行挣脱牢笼会导致难以预料的后果，我犯不起任何错误。而且，还有一件事情我非常肯定——格雷托的植入物和我的植入物一直在交换数据，这意味着你还活着。因此，我选择耐心等待。”
languages.original_text: "I doubt it. Loosening the cage's fastenings without being noticed proved to be quite difficult. Besides, without you and Glaito there, the outcome would have been too unpredictable, and I had no room for error. But there was one thing I knew for sure: Glaito's implants and mine were exchanging data logs, which meant you were alive. So I waited."

traits.locale_text: “这恐怕不太现实，想在不引起注意的情况下拆开笼子的紧固件，恐怕相当困难。而且，你和格雷托也不在场，强行挣脱牢笼会导致难以预料的后果，我犯不起任何错误。而且，还有一件事情我非常肯定——格雷托的植入物和我的植入物一直在交换数据，这意味着你还活着。因此，我选择耐心等待。”

languages.text: 「難しいと思いますよ。気付かれずに檻の留め具を緩めるのは極めて困難です。その上、あなたとグライトがそばにいないと、結果はあまりに予測不能になってしまいます。失敗するわけにはいきませんから。ただ、一つ確信していたことがあります。グライトのインプラントと私のインプラントがデータログを交信していました。つまり、あなたが生きているということです。だから私は待ったのです」
languages.original_text: "I doubt it. Loosening the cage's fastenings without being noticed proved to be quite difficult. Besides, without you and Glaito there, the outcome would have been too unpredictable, and I had no room for error. But there was one thing I knew for sure: Glaito's implants and mine were exchanging data logs, which meant you were alive. So I waited."

traits.locale_text: 「難しいと思いますよ。気付かれずに檻の留め具を緩めるのは極めて困難です。その上、あなたとグライトがそばにいないと、結果はあまりに予測不能になってしまいます。失敗するわけにはいきませんから。ただ、一つ確信していたことがあります。グライトのインプラントと私のインプラントがデータログを交信していました。つまり、あなたが生きているということです。だから私は待ったのです」

languages.text: "Das bezweifle ich. Die Verschlüsse des Käfigs zu lösen, ohne bemerkt zu werden, erwies sich als recht schwierig. Außerdem wäre das Ergebnis ohne Euch und Glaito zu unberechenbar gewesen, und ich durfte mir keinen Fehle erlauben. Doch eines wusste ich gewiss: Glaitos und meine Implantate tauschten Datenlogs aus, Ihr wart also am Leben. Also wartete ich."
languages.original_text: "I doubt it. Loosening the cage's fastenings without being noticed proved to be quite difficult. Besides, without you and Glaito there, the outcome would have been too unpredictable, and I had no room for error. But there was one thing I knew for sure: Glaito's implants and mine were exchanging data logs, which meant you were alive. So I waited."

traits.locale_text: "Das bezweifle ich. Die Verschlüsse des Käfigs zu lösen, ohne bemerkt zu werden, erwies sich als recht schwierig. Außerdem wäre das Ergebnis ohne Euch und Glaito zu unberechenbar gewesen, und ich durfte mir keinen Fehle erlauben. Doch eines wusste ich gewiss: Glaitos und meine Implantate tauschten Datenlogs aus, Ihr wart also am Leben. Also wartete ich."

languages.text: "Hiç sanmıyorum. Kafesin perçinlerini fark ettirmeden gevşetmek epey zordu. Üstelik siz ve Glaito yanımda değilken akıbet fazlasıyla belirsiz olurdu, dolayısıyla en ufak hataya yer yoktu. Fakat bir şeyden emindim: Glaito'nun implantlarıyla benimkiler sürekli veri alışverişi yapıyordu, bu da sizin hayatta olduğunuzu gösteriyordu. Bu yüzden bekledim."
languages.original_text: "I doubt it. Loosening the cage's fastenings without being noticed proved to be quite difficult. Besides, without you and Glaito there, the outcome would have been too unpredictable, and I had no room for error. But there was one thing I knew for sure: Glaito's implants and mine were exchanging data logs, which meant you were alive. So I waited."

traits.locale_text: "Hiç sanmıyorum. Kafesin perçinlerini fark ettirmeden gevşetmek epey zordu. Üstelik sizle Glaito yanımda değilken akıbet fazlasıyla belirsiz olurdu, dolayısıyla en ufak hataya yer yoktu. Fakat bir şeyden emindim: Glaito'nun implantlarıyla benimkiler sürekli veri alışverişi yapıyordu, bu da sizin hayatta olduğunuzu gösteriyordu. Bu yüzden bekledim."

languages.text: «Lo dudo. Aflojar el cierre de la jaula sin ser detectado demostró ser considerablemente complicado. Además, sin usted ni Glaito a mi lado, el resultado habría sido demasiado impredecible, y no podía permitirme ningún error. Pero había algo que sabía con seguridad: los implantes de Glaito y los míos intercambiaban registros de datos, lo que significaba que usted estaba vivo. De modo que esperé».
languages.original_text: "I doubt it. Loosening the cage's fastenings without being noticed proved to be quite difficult. Besides, without you and Glaito there, the outcome would have been too unpredictable, and I had no room for error. But there was one thing I knew for sure: Glaito's implants and mine were exchanging data logs, which meant you were alive. So I waited."

traits.locale_text: «Lo dudo. Aflojar el cierre de la jaula sin ser detectado demostró ser considerablemente complicado. Además, sin usted ni Glaito a mi lado, el resultado habría sido demasiado impredecible, y no podía permitirme ningún error. Pero había algo que sabía con seguridad: los implantes de Glaito y los míos intercambiaban registros de datos, lo que significaba que usted estaba vivo. De modo que esperé».

languages.text: « J'en doute. Il m'aurait été très difficile de défaire les attaches de la cage sans me faire remarquer. De plus, sans vous et Glaito, l'issue aurait été trop imprévisible et je n'avais pas de marge d'erreur. J'étais certain d'une chose, cependant : les implants de Glaito et les miens échangeaient des données, ce qui voulait dire que vous étiez en vie. J'ai donc préféré attendre. »
languages.original_text: "I doubt it. Loosening the cage's fastenings without being noticed proved to be quite difficult. Besides, without you and Glaito there, the outcome would have been too unpredictable, and I had no room for error. But there was one thing I knew for sure: Glaito's implants and mine were exchanging data logs, which meant you were alive. So I waited."
